manager

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    manages the Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete of Users

      • retrieveUser

        public User retrieveUser(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Retrieve a user based on username and password (includes validation)
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        password - the password of the user
        Returns:
        retrieve user based on username and password (password must be correct, else null)

        Parameters:
        username - the username of the updated user
